docs.text: smoc-schema Metadata schema for the SMOC Multi-Omics Digital Object URI: https://w3id.org/sdsc-ordes/smoc-schema Name: smoc-schema Classes Class Description Experiment A coordinated set of actions designed to generate data. An experiment can contain multiple samples and datasets. NamedThing A generic grouping for any identifiable entity Study Represents the digital object. It encapsulates omics and other datasets and their metadata. Record An individual data record. Examples include an array or an alignment file. AlignmentSet A data record consisting of genomic intervals aligned to a reference. Array Data record consisting of an N-dimensional array. VariantSet A data record consisting of genomic variants relative to a reference. ReferenceGenome Reference assembly of a given genome, consisting of a collection of congiguous sequences (contigs). ReferenceSequence A contiguous sequence of DNA part of a reference coordinate system (genome assembly). Sample A biological sample used in experiments. Examples include a whole organism, tissue or cell line. StudyCollection A holder for Study objects Slots Slot Description collector The organization responsible for collecting a given sample completion_date The date on which the concluding information for this study is completed description A human-readable description for a thing entries format Data/file format associated with a data record has_experiment An experiment has_record Data record included in a given collection has_sample Biological sample included or described by a given thing has_sequence Denotes that a sequence beolongs to a collection (e id A unique identifier for a thing location The location of a data record, either on the web or the filesystem name A human-readable name for a thing omics_type The type of omics considered sequence_md5 The pre-computed hash uniquely representing a biological sequence source_uri The URI from which a resource was obtained start_date The date on which this study began taxon_id The taxid number describing the taxonomic range of a sample Enumerations Enumeration Description DataFormat OmicsType Types Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
